name: E-Commerce App Design
description:
Hello There 😍


✅ Here's the idea for the Figma Template is a unique and creative design with amazing colors and clean typography.


✅ We have created the UI Library of the components which could be used in mobile apps of various spheres. Colors, sizes, and elements are customizable. 42 screens, which is useful for any projects.


✅ App Features:

✅ To choose items by price, color, sizes, etc

✅ To add items to favorites to buy them later

✅ To find products by image search

✅ To set several payment methods and delivery addresses

✅ To leave review

✅ And many more


✅ Hope you enjoy it! Thanks for your likes ❤️ and comments!


✅ Have an amazing project?


✅ Project & Work Inquiry

Hitesh Tapaniya (Benzatine Infotech)
